QuestData.Title: Words for Delivery
QuestData.Description: Here we go. This is the speech, $n!$B$BIt has everything to be a great battle starter: It's inspirational, has eloquent language and speaks directly to gnomes. Never has a finer speech been written!$B$BTurn this in to Captain Tread Sparknozzle and get some transportation to High Tinker Mekkatorque!
QuestData.LogDescription: Give the speech to Captain Tread Sparknozzle at Steelgrill Depot.
QuestData.RewardText: Toby is all done with the speech? Let me see...$b<Reads the speech> Pumping pistons! What a fantastic speech! I knew Toby was a good writer, but this is perhaps the best he's ever written.$bI think it's time to get you out to the battle.
